facebook/react-native.summary: Recent activities in the facebook/react-native repository include a refactor of the Build HermesC apple job to use the same code in all jobs, as well as a synchronization of renderers between React and React Native in preparation for the 0.76 branch cut, aiming to address internal issues and improve overall performance.

facebook/hermes.summary: The facebook/hermes repository has seen a recent addition of iOS e2e tests, currently a work-in-progress, that depend on a related pull request in the react-native repository, focusing on ensuring the new job in CircleCI is successfully green.

facebook/stetho.summary: In the facebook/stetho repository, a recent pull request added null checks before using element info to resolve an existing issue, demonstrating ongoing efforts to enhance the repository's stability and fix known problems.
